official_title: A bill to amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 to establish seven year terms of office and to restrict the conditions under which Inspectors General may be removed from office, and for other purposes.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services
Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Amends the Inspector General Act of 1978, the Department of Energy Organization Act, and the law establishing the Office of Inspector General in the Department of Health and Human Services to establish seven year terms of office for Inspectors General, and to prohibit their removal from office for reasons other than neglect of duty or malfeasance in office.
